## outerJoinDataFrames() function

### outerJoinDataFrames() function

This will return a single frame joined by the first matching field. When a join field is not specified, the default will use the first time field

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function outerJoinDataFrames(options: JoinOptions): DataFrame | undefined;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { outerJoinDataFrames } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>JoinOptions</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`DataFrame | undefined`
